intro: The Central Utah Tree Festival is made possible through the generous support of local businesses, organizations, and community members who share our commitment to helping families in Sanpete County. Our sponsors play a vital role in ensuring that no child is denied specialized medical care due to travel costs.

tiers.name: Platinum Sponsors
benefits: Premier logo placement on all materials

platinum.title: Become Our First Platinum Sponsor
platinum.text: Help lead the way in supporting families throughout Sanpete County.

gold.title: Join Our Gold Sponsors
gold.text: Make a significant impact on families in need of support.

silver.title: Become a Silver Sponsor
silver.text: Support families with meaningful contributions to their journey.

bronze.title: Join Our Bronze Sponsors
bronze.text: Every contribution helps cover travel costs for families.

community.title: Become a Community Partner
community.text: Donate trees, decorations, supplies, or your time and talents.
